meanings.definition: Any of a group of closely related compounds that include cannabinol and the active constituents of cannabis.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained how cannabinoids can help reduce pain in patients.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are studying the effects of cannabinoids on the human body.
meanings.sent3: The cannabinoids in the medicine made the patient feel like a superhero.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a garden, with cannabinoids blooming like colorful flowers.
meanings.sent5: The cannabinoids danced through his veins, bringing relief and calmness.

meanings.definition: A class of diverse chemical compounds that act on cannabinoid receptors in cells.
meanings.sent1: The scientist discussed the different types of cannabinoids found in plants.
meanings.sent2: Cannabinoids bind to specific receptors in the body to produce various effects.
meanings.sent3: The cannabinoids in the body had a party, celebrating their unique abilities.
meanings.sent4: In the world of cells, cannabinoids were the key that unlocked many doors.
meanings.sent5: The presence of cannabinoids in the system was like a symphony playing in harmony.
